      • getExpression

        public Expression getExpression(java.lang.String name,
                                TokenStream ts,
                                ExpressionStream es,
                                boolean isFirst)
                         throws CTSyntaxException
        Parameters:
        name - name of instruction
        ts - the TokenStream
        es - the ExpressionStream
        isFirst - if this the first expression after a parenthesis.
        Returns:
        the Expression object representing the instruction.
        Throws:
        CTSyntaxException - if incorrect number of parameter given
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if token not registered

      • getExpression

        public Expression getExpression(java.lang.String name,
                                TokenStream ts,
                                ExpressionStream es)
                         throws CTSyntaxException
        Parameters:
        name - name of instruction
        ts - the TokenStream
        es - the ExpressionStream
        Returns:
        the Expression object representing the instruction. This should be equivalent to getExpression(name, ts, es, false)
        Throws:
        CTSyntaxException - if incorrect number of parameter given
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if token not registered
